sense.gloss: to appear, to come in sight, to become visible, to come out, to embody, to materialize, to materialise
to be expressed (e.g. emotions), to become apparent (e.g. trends, effects)

sdata.j: まもなく↑彼↑↓かれ↓は|↑現↑↓あら↓われる|でしょう。
sdata.e: It will not be long before he turns up.

sdata.j: えみがすぐ|↑現↑↓あら↓われる|ことを↑望↑↓のぞ↓みます。もう↑待↑↓ま↓ちくたびれました。
sdata.e: I hope that Emi will appear soon. I'm tired of waiting for her.

sdata.j: ↑真実↑↓しんじつ↓はいつか|↑現↑↓あら↓われる|。
sdata.e: The truth will come out one day.

sdata.j: ↑友達↑↓ともだち↓が|↑現↑↓あら↓われる|のを↑長↑↓なが↓い↑間↑↓あいだ↓↑待↑↓ま↓つといらいらする。
sdata.e: I feel restless when I have to wait too long for my friend to show up.
